paragraphs.title: Infodemics Data
paragraphs.html: Public posts on Twitter, analyzed with state-of-the-art machine learning techniques for: (1) population emotional state (circumplex and OCEAN psychological decomposition); (2) bot/human classification; (3) news reliability.

paragraphs.title: Other Data
paragraphs.html:
• Epidemics: publicly available data repository operated by the Johns Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering, based on data fusion from different sources, including WHO, CDC, ECDC, NHC and DXY.
  • Financial: TODO
